item.title: Information Theory Overview
item.description: Roadmap based on youtube introductory series. Compression (efficiency, source coding) Error Correction (reliability, channel coding) Information Theory (Math) Losless: source coding theorem, Kraft-McMillan inequality Lossy: rate distortion theorem Coding Methods (algorithms) Symbol Code: Huffman codes Hamming codes, BCH codes, Turbocodes, Gallager codes Stream Codes: arithmetic coding Information How many bits are needed to encode information:

item.title: Math/ML Resources
item.description: Math Title Format Notes Probability Through Problems PDF ; BOOK Best introductory probability book out there. Learn by discovering! Principles And Techniques In Combinatorics BOOK ; PDF Beautiful book: simple, clear explanations, no filler, challenging problems Computer Science Title Format Notes Information Theory And Coding YouTube Lectures Elements Of Information Theory (2nd Ed.
